meanings.definition: A plant of the family Gesneriaceae, typically with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: I love growing gesneriads in my garden because they have beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The gesneriads in the botanical garden were in full bloom, attracting many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The gesneriads in the greenhouse were gossiping about the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with gesneriads, turning it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The gesneriads swayed gently in the breeze, like dancers in a floral ballet.

meanings.definition: The family of plants that includes African violets and gloxinias.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother has a collection of gesneriads, including African violets and gloxinias.
meanings.sent2: The gesneriads are known for their diverse species, from African violets to gloxinias.
meanings.sent3: The gesneriads were having a family reunion, with African violets and gloxinias sharing stories.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, gesneriads are like a big, happy family with African violets and gloxinias as siblings.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the greenhouse, I marveled at the variety of gesneriads, from African violets to gloxinias.
